pkgmetadata.longdescription: ``getlino`` is a command-line tool for installing Lino in different environments.Note: If you **just want to install** Lino, then this documentation tree is**not for you**. You want to read the `Hosting Guide<https://hosting.lino-framework.org/>`__ or the `Developer Guide<https://dev.lino-framework.org/>`__ instead. This documentation tree is forpeople who want to help with developing the tool that you use to install Lino.- Project homepage: https://gitlab.com/lino-framework/getlino- Documentation: https://getlino.lino-framework.org/ (mirrored at https://lino-framework.gitlab.io/getlino/)
